context.rdfs:comment:
A reservation for a rental car.

Note: This type is for information about actual reservations, e.g. in confirmation emails or HTML pages with individual confirmations of reservations.
context.rdfs:label: RentalCarReservation

properties.rdfs:comment: Where a rental car can be dropped off.
properties.rdfs:label: dropoffLocation

properties.rdfs:comment: When a rental car can be dropped off.
properties.rdfs:label: dropoffTime
